TopicTitle: Any Suggestions one new features to ksp, just wondering what other people think around this kind of topic.

Articles.Content:
I was just thinking on what should be implemented into ksp.

I was thinking a town or 2 and maybe road traffic. Also air traffic stuff like that. Maybe rival space programs like it was in the space race. Also some more scenarios and tutorials could have an effect on some new players than just learning from some poorly rendered YouTube videos.
All of which are not going to be implemented any time soon and I believe are on the frequently requested features list.

On 27/03/2016 at 2:56 AM, Rhapo The Engineer said:

 Also some more scenarios and tutorials could have an effect on some new players than just learning from some poorly rendered YouTube videos.

Better tutorials and KSPedia coming in 1.1, so there's that....Also there are many ways you could learn than just watching videos. As for rival space agencies and other stuff, not anytime soon...

Edited March 29, 2016 by Atlas2342

Have an intern or whatever put together a few hundred or a thousand fascinating space or othwerwise sciencey anecdotes or factual titbits of a few lines to a paragraph or so in content and dot them around the Kerbol system so that they are displayed on screen when a Kerbal (or probe, I guess) is in close enough physical proximity (distances to be worked out at another time) with a little science/funds boost maybe? 

Just super-simple little interesting things to find.

4 hours ago, p1t1o said:

Have an intern or whatever put together a few hundred or a thousand fascinating space or othwerwise sciencey anecdotes or factual titbits of a few lines to a paragraph or so in content and dot them around the Kerbol system so that they are displayed on screen when a Kerbal (or probe, I guess) is in close enough physical proximity (distances to be worked out at another time) with a little science/funds boost maybe? 

Just super-simple little interesting things to find.

Use them as actual loading screen tips...although, I hope 1.1 will make loading times slightly less than 2 eternities
I see you've not played before 1.0.  Before the loading times were 3min+ stock

On 3/27/2016 at 2:56 AM, Rhapo The Engineer said:

I was just thinking on what should be implemented into ksp.

 Maybe rival space programs

The devs have said that rival space programs will not be part of the game...(i think)

What I really want is stock props, and fixed part connections.  

Kill the rocket flop with fire. (Band name)
